001package org.biopax.validator.web.service;
002
003import org.biopax.paxtools.normalizer.MiriamLink;
004import org.biopax.validator.web.dto.Clue;
005import org.biopax.validator.web.dto.Xref;
006import org.biopax.validator.CvFactory;
007import org.biopax.validator.XrefUtils;
008import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
009import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
010
011import java.util.Arrays;
012
013
014@Service
015public class SuggesterService implements Suggester {
016  private XrefUtils xrefUtils;
017  private CvFactory cvFactory; //TODO: add methods that call CvFactory
018
019  @Autowired
020  public SuggesterService(XrefUtils xrefUtils, CvFactory cvFactory) {
021    this.xrefUtils = xrefUtils;
022    this.cvFactory = cvFactory;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public String getPrimaryDbName(String xrefDb) {
027    String name = xrefUtils.getPrimaryDbName(xrefDb);
028    return (name != null) ? name.toLowerCase() : null;
029  }
030
031  @Override
032  public Clue xref(Xref[] xrefs) {
033    Clue clue;
034
035    if(xrefs!=null && xrefs.length>0) {
036      clue = new Clue("Checked xrefs; suggested standard name and URI for valid ones.");
037      Arrays.stream(xrefs).forEach(xref -> clue.addValue(suggest(xref.getDb(), xref.getId())));
038    } else {
039      // null or empty xrefs value is not allowed
040//      clue = new Clue("A list of recommended data collection names and ID " +
041//        "patterns for BioPAX Xref.db and Xref.id.");
042//      Arrays.stream(MiriamLink.getDataTypesId())
043//        .map(MiriamLink::getDatatype).forEach(datatype -> {
044//          Xref x = new Xref();
045//          x.setPreferredDb(datatype.getName());
046//          x.setNamespace(datatype.getNamespace());
047//          x.setId(datatype.getPattern());
048//          x.setUri(String.format("http://identifiers.org/%s/", x.getNamespace()));
049//          clue.addValue(x);
050//      });
051      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Input array is empty or null.");
052    }
053
054    return clue;
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public String xrefDbIdToUri(String db, String id) {
059    Xref checked = suggest(db, id);
060    if (!checked.isDbOk()) {
061      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot recognize DB: " + db);
062    } else if(!checked.isIdOk()) {
063      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format(
064        "DB:'%s'('%s'), ID:'%s' failed", db, checked.getPreferredDb(), id));
065    }
066
067    return checked.getUri();
068  }
069
070  private Xref suggest(String db, String id) {
071    Xref x = new Xref();
072    x.setDb(db);
073    x.setId(id);
074    //check (can auto-correct some misspellings, such as 'Entrez_Gene')
075    String name = getPrimaryDbName(db);
076    if (name == null) {
077      x.setDbOk(false);
078    } else {
079      x.setDbOk(true);
080      x.setPreferredDb(name);
081      x.setNamespace(MiriamLink.getDatatype(name).getNamespace());
082      try { //now with valid name
083        String uri = MiriamLink.getIdentifiersOrgURI(name, id);
084        x.setUri(uri);
085        x.setIdOk(true);
086      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {//pattern failed
087        x.setIdOk(false);
088      }
089    }
090
091    return x;
092  }
093}
